Target: OntoPlot is an ontology developed to describe the attributes of land plots and their buildable spaces.

Comment: Buildable Space is an abstract concept that represents the maximum legally allowable space on a plot that can built up according to relevant planning regulations. The buildable space is the portion of the land that complies with these regulations and is designated for construction.
Label: Buildable Space

Comment: A plot is an area of land that is often delineated with a physical boundary to denote land ownership rights. It is frequently adopted as a basic spatial unit for a cadastre or land registration system.
Label: Plot

Comment: A relationship that links the allowed absolute height for the specified buildable space.
Label: has allowed absolute height

Comment: A relationship that links the allowed floor to floor height for the specified buildable space.
Label: has allowed floor to floor height

Comment: A relationship that links the allowed  gross floor area for the specified buildable space.
Label: has allowed gross floor area

Comment: A relationship that links the required party wall for the specified buildable space from the plot boundary.
Label: has required party wall

Comment: A relationship that links the required setback for the specified buildable space from the plot boundary.
Label: has required setback

Comment: A relationship that links the allowed gross plot ratio for the specified plot.
Label: has allowed gross plot ratio

Comment: A relationship that links the allowed site coverage for the specified plot.
Label: has allowed site coverage

Comment: A relationship that defines the area of a plot
Label: has site area

Comment: A relationship that links the buildable space for the specified plot.
Label: has buildable space

Comment: A relationship that indicates the neighbouring plot for the specified plot.
Label: has neighbour

Comment: A relationship that defines the road type of a plot.
Label: has owner

Comment: A relationship that defines the price of a specified plot.
Label: has price

Comment: A relationship that defines the road type of a plot.
Label: has road type

Comment: A relationship that indicates if the plot is a corner plot or not.
Label: is corner plot

Comment: A relationship that indicates if the plot is found at the residential fringe or not.
Label: at residential fringe
